article.headline: Bank of America Corp. stock rises Thursday, outperforms market
article.body: Shares of Bank of America Corp. BAC, +0.47% rallied 1.45% to $25.24 Thursday, on what proved to be an all-around favorable trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index SPX, +0.87% rising 0.80% to 3,446.83 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average DJIA, +0.56% rising 0.43% to 28,425.51. This was the stock's second consecutive day of gains. Bank of America Corp. closed $10.48 below its 52-week high ($35.72), which the company achieved on December 27th. The stock demonstrated a mixed performance when compared to some of its competitors Thursday, as JPMorgan Chase & Co. JPM, -0.57% rose 2.06% to $101.78, Wells Fargo & Co. WFC, rose 1.98% to $25.30, and Citigroup Inc. C, +0.47% fell 0.27% to $44.72. Trading volume (51.7 M) remained 4.6 million below its 50-day average volume of 56.3 M.
